response.overview: The slightly autobiographical but mostly made-up story of a gay man and a straight woman - who own a company together. And own a house together. By all accounts, they are together. Though he's gay and she's straight - they are soulmates. With absolutely nothing going on in their personal lives and the growing need to reproduce, they decide to - what the hell - get married and have a baby - together. Then he meets what could possibly be the love of his life. And she meets the love that got away and wants back in. Oh and that stick gets peed on and it's a big "+".
response.title: Half Husband
